pkgmetadata.longdescription: PyCriteo=========PyCriteo is a simple Python library to access the Criteo API.It uses Python convenient built in dictionaries to make API requests.Basic usage:-----------Get all running campaigns >>> from pycriteo import Client >>> c = Client('username', 'password', 'token') >>> campaigns = c.getCampaigns({'campaignStatus': 'RUNNING'}) >>> dict(campaigns.campaign[0]).keys() ['status', 'campaignID', 'categoryBids', 'budgetID', 'campaignName', 'remainingDays', 'campaignBid'] Schedule a report job >>> job = c.scheduleReportJob( {'reportType': 'Category', 'reportSelector': { 'CampaignIDs': [i.campaignID for i in campaigns.campaign]}, 'startDate': '2014-01-01', 'endDate': '2014-30-01', 'isResultGzipped': False, 'aggregationType': 'Daily' } )Save the report job as csv >>> c.downloadReport(job.jobID, 'my_report.csv')Installation-------------- pip install pycriteoLicense----Apache 2.0
